traveler-in-time.title: Traveler In Time
traveler-in-time.description: Who wouldn't want to travel back or forward in time? I have the pleasure to bring you another song with Elvya this time with a time traveler theme, get ready to be delighted with a chill-type beat using sparkly and enveloping sounds that we could probably hear during a time teleportation while everything stops around you üí´. I came up with the instrumental of this song as an idea of mine almost 3 years ago but the result never convinced me so I never released it until talking to Elvya I showed her the demo and she added that magic missing, Now it comes alive thanks to her amazing vocals as always üíú.

traveler-in-time-instrumental.title: Traveler In Time (Instrumental)
traveler-in-time-instrumental.description: Instrumental version of Traveler In Time. Read more about the song in the original version!

autumn-leaves-fall-remix.title: Autumn Leaves Fall (Dimatis Remix)
autumn-leaves-fall-remix.description: It's a pleasure to have remixed such a wonderful song by Mox Jade and Sydney Grimm üíô. I found out about the contest really late but surprisingly I managed to finish my remix a few days before the deadline, and I'm glad I did because I'm one of the three winners!! This is one of my favorite remixes of all time.

wonderland-remix.title: Wonderland (Dimatis Remix)
wonderland-remix.description: Thanks so much to Christoph Sebastian Pabst for letting me remix his contemporary vocal song with Valeska Rautenberg Music and to Sine Music for releasing this on their label, it was a pleasure working on this remix, hope you all like these vibes ‚ù§Ô∏è

let-me-go.title: Let Me Go
let-me-go.description: Another release this month! I'm so excited to share with you all this Emotional Chill Future Garage and Melodic Dubstep special song with Elvya! Meeting again after 2 years!

fade-away.title: Fade Away
fade-away.description: Maybe this is not my best song, but I really like how it turned out, I tried to be a bit more modern. Hope you like it üíô. This year has been a year of new experiences, and difficult decisions, I learned to drive, I graduated from university, got my first job, I caught covid but I'm recovered, and I'm traveling to another country for the first time next week, and many other things. I'm also always happy and grateful to know there are people waiting for more releases from me, you all are the best!

snowflake-remix.title: Snowflake (Dimatis Remix)
snowflake-remix.description: It was quite a challenge to remix "Snowflake" by NAWN but I'm so excited to say that my remix got the 2nd place in his remix contest! thank you for the opportunity, it was a pleasure to be part of this contest with so many talented producers üíô.

afterglow.title: Afterglow
afterglow.description: A year ago I did a remix for a remix competition by Beatcore, I had no place in the winners, I know that feeling of disappointment with yourself because I have participated in several contests that I didn't win an official remix placement but I know I've been making music for many years now and I can't let things like this affect me. I remember I didn't even want to listen to it again until a good told me that it's a beautiful remix and that it would be nice to release it, and now I feel like it's such a great track, NEVER feel bad about your creations! So since I only used the vocals from the original I decided to release the instrumental on all platforms as self-release you can still listen to the remix version üíô.

afterglow-remix.title: Afterglow (Dimatis Remix)
afterglow-remix.description: Finally, one year later I decided to upload this remix I did for the "Beatcore & Livingston Crain - Afterglow" remix contest last year, I didn't make it to the winners but now I'm really proud of this ‚ù§ .  Also, I just released the instrumental of this remix as a self-release on all music platforms and I named it "Afterglow"!

call-out.title: Call Out
call-out.description: We're excited for you to listen to our new song! "Call Out" is an electropop-style track with future bass and modern dance music influences including melancholy vocals. Although our musical styles are completely different, somehow we always manage to merge our styles as in previous collaborations we have done like Dive, Serenity, Hold on To Me, Reborn, and now Call Out.

call-out-instrumental.title: Call Out (Instrumental)
call-out-instrumental.description: We're excited for you to listen to our new song! "Call Out" is an electropop-style track with future bass and modern dance music influences including melancholy vocals. Although our musical styles are completely different, somehow we always manage to merge our styles as in previous collaborations we have done like Dive, Serenity, Hold on To Me, Reborn, and now Call Out.

feeling.title: Feeling
feeling.description: I hope you all enjoy this powerful melodic dubstep track, it was a pleasure working with Emantium and talking to him to create this song ‚ù§ I remember when he sent me the idea, I started working on it right away, we left it for a while but it deserved a release and we finally finished it.

just-stay.title: Just Stay
just-stay.description: Positive and beautiful chill vibes to end the year ‚ù§ I made this song inspired by this fantastic painting art and it's also inspired by my song "Overcoming" which has been very popular these years so I decided to make something similar this time! This is my last song of the year. I wish you a wonderful end of the year, I'm immensely grateful for all the support, couldn't thank you enough, you all are the best and have a big place in my heart and life.

i-will-someday.title: I Will Someday
i-will-someday.description: After 5 months I'm excited to be back at making music! I've been thinking a lot about the direction of music I don't want to get stuck or behind so I'll probably try new things in the next songs but keep my "Dimatis" style. ‚ù§ I want to thank everyone who continues listening to me on any platform commenting, liking, adding to playlists, and sharing my music, you all motivate me to keep doing what I love to and thanks to everyone who asked me through my socials how I was doing! And about this song, every song I make has a reason for being or a feeling attached to it about what I felt at that moment while making it, it's been a year since I met the nicest and most supportive and caring person I've ever met but we are really far from each other and we hope to get together someday soon, so this a classic Dimati's melodic dubstep style song with optimistic and hopeful vibes.

paying-for-it.title: Paying For It (feat. Salvo)
paying-for-it.description: Happy to share my new melodic dubstep song called "Paying For It" featuring Salvo vocals released on ARWV label! This is another song that I've been working on for quite some time. Enjoy!

fly-again.title: Fly Again (feat. Miss Lina)
fly-again.description: I'm so happy to announce this new song "Fly Again", the lyrics are about the hope of going out normally again after having been through all this situation that we all know last year, some day we will have the energy to be able to fly again üíï, thanks to Miss Lina, she did an incredible job on the lyrics and with such an amazing voice I loved how this turned out, also thanks so much to MissChibiArtist for making this lovely illustration for the artwork of the song, I love how talented people come together to help me create something beautiful. I don't have enough words to thank everyone who continues to support me, it has only been 3 months this year and it is being incredible because I'm achieving many milestones that I never thought I would achieve in my life. I hope you like this song üïäüíúüíô

stay-remix.title: Stay (Dimatis Remix)
stay-remix.description: Thanks to Eunoia for letting me remix "Stay" üíï

worthy-of-life.title: Worthy of Life
worthy-of-life.description: I made this song two weeks ago because some friends published that a friend of theirs needed to raise funds for a heart surgery, they started a campaign where they motivated several producers to donate songs for a compilation album where every earning went to the cost of the surgery, so I decided to make this song for that and try to help (even I didn't know him I just wanted to help), the campaign was a success and the goal was achieved with the help of many people, I am very proud of the chill community ‚ù§

euphoria-remix.title: Euphoria (Dimatis Remix)
euphoria-remix.description: I recently heard the English cover by @Chymes of "BTS - Euphoria" song and I was fascinated by her voice, so I decided to create this Melodic Dubstep remix, I hope you like it and please follow Chymes, she has amazing songs üíô

hold-on-to-me.title: Hold On To Me
hold-on-to-me.description: This is different from my usual style, we like to try different genres together, this time we try some Future Bass with vocals. Hope you like it and if not, don't worry, more Melodic Dubstep songs are coming this year. üíñ

who-am-i-without-you.title: Who Am I Without You
who-am-i-without-you.description: I am very excited for you to listen to my new song "Who Am I Without You" sometimes when I feel lacking in creativity or inspiration I like to look for drawings, imagine a story and create a song out of it. Thanks to erien.ato (Alien Art) a Panamanian illustrator for allowing me to use her art for my song. It's a bit different from my usual style but hope you like it!

out-there.title: Out There
out-there.description: I am very excited to present my new collaboration with Elvya ü§©, we met a month ago on Discord, I took an idea from one of my previous projects üí°and sent it to her to record something, in a couple of hours she sent me her vocals, I impressed that she is so fast üò±. Also thanks to Albert Weand for letting me use his art for the song cover art and thanks to Visualmadness for editing the cover art ‚ù§

otherworld-remix.title: Otherworld (Dimatis Remix)
otherworld-remix.description: I was participating in the remix competition of "Otherworld" by Killigrew, I met many talented people there ‚ù§.

two-ways.title: Two Ways
two-ways.description: I wasn't sure if I should release this song so I posted it on my Facebook to know what people thought about it, and many people liked it and told me that it is obviously a release. I always love the amazing support you all give to my music. I hope you like this song named "Two Ways" more good music is coming :)

escape-with-you-remix.title: Escape With You (Dimatis Remix)
escape-with-you-remix.description: Hello, I inform you that I am safe at home, I hope that all this will end soon, I have had problems releasing my original songs these days so I decided to make a Melodic Dubstep remix of the new Kooma & Veela release "Escape With You". Please take care and stay safe ‚ù§.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: Hello, I am very excited to present my first album "Experiences" this album represents some feelings of my experiences lived during 2019, I hope you like it.

grief.title: Grief
grief.description: Liquid Drum & bass is one of my favorite genres, this is one more attempt to make this style. This song represents the pain of the loss of someone important in our lives.

moments-together.title: Moments Together
moments-together.description: This is a love chill track. I did most of these songs in December 2019 holidays and put in a lot of effort because the rest of the year I was busy with my university studies. This song represents that feeling of the moments together with someone important in our lives.

now.title: Now
now.description: I love working with vocals, took these from Laniakea Sounds on splice.com. I hope you are liking the album!

overcoming.title: Overcoming
overcoming.description: This is an inspirational Chill/Future Garage track, I'm in love with this style since I made "Mists" from my "Floating" EP. Many people don't know but I lived 4 years with anxiety disorders and constantly fears, I overcame it in April 2019 and this song represents the overcoming of these types of problems that usually appear in our lives.

serenity.title: Serenity
serenity.description: Sometimes I try to make music with my twin brother but our styles are so different that it is difficult to combine them and we end up making a style that we do not know what genre is.

unusual.title: Unusual
unusual.description: I've always wanted to try this style, maybe it's not my best song but it's not bad to try new things :)

exhilaration-remix.title: Exhilaration (feat. Lotis.) (Dimatis Remix)
exhilaration-remix.description: My entry for "Exhilaration" remix competition by Sappheiros üíô.

sign-of-time.title: Sign Of Time
sign-of-time.description: Lately, I haven't had much time to create more music, I hope you like this melodic dubstep track called Sign Of Time ‚ù§ Also, I've already started some new tracks so I hope to finish them soon.

fantasy-remix.title: Fantasy (Dimatis Remix)
fantasy-remix.description: Not my best remix but I loved the original song a lot and decided to make a Future Bas edit of it ‚ù§.

celeste.title: Celeste
celeste.description: I really like piano songs, I'm not the best at composing solo piano but I made this for a special person <3

turns-to-dust-remix.title: Turns To Dust (feat. Nilka) (Dimatis Remix)
turns-to-dust-remix.description: This is my entry for the remix contest of "Turns To Dust" by Sound Surfer & Verso <3 also Thanks to New Dawn Collective for making this contest and inspiring other artists to create more music. Hope you like it!

maybe-remix.title: Maybe (feat. Chymes) (Dimatis Remix)
maybe-remix.description: Art by leonardermel.de, Original Song by Tim Schaufert - Maybe (feat. Chymes)

quity.title: Q√ºity
quity.description: My dog named "Q√ºity" passed away on February 25 so I decided to make a song in her memory. My brother and I found her abandoned about 12 years ago, so I calculate that she died with about 14 or 15 years old, we adopted and gave her a home, she wasn't from a special breed, but was very important to me as part of my family, she was blind in her last days and I was in her care, I'm glad she can rest now. His weird name comes from a neighbor who called her "Queeny" but we interpreted the pronunciation in Spanish as "Q√ºity". There are some images and videos of her in my YouTube video.

floating.title: Floating
floating.description: Floating is a melodic dubstep track and it's the second of the EP.

mists.title: Mists
mists.description: Mists is a Future Garage track and is the first of the Floating EP.

shades.title: Shades
shades.description: Shades from the Floating EP by Dimatis. Liquid Drum & Bass this time!

what-awaits-us.title: What Awaits Us
what-awaits-us.description: The last track of the Floating EP is a Chillstep made in a 3/4 time signature.

gris-remix.title: Gris, Pt. 1 (Dimatis Remix)
gris-remix.description: I remixed the main theme of the game GRIS! I recently discovered this game, I was fascinated by its music and I bought the song to make a remix, enjoy!

demure.title: Demure
demure.description: I made a trancestep/melodic dubstep track.

glare.title: Glare
glare.description: I'm making chill tracks that feel so emotional... Released on Meditation Station by Artist Intelligence Agency.

heartbeat.title: Heartbeat
heartbeat.description: Vocals by KARRA from her vocal pack on Splice.

moonlit-lover-piano.title: Moonlit Lover (Piano Version)
moonlit-lover-piano.description: Piano version of Moonlit Lover. I hope this makes you feel something ‚ù§

bliss.title: Bliss
bliss.description: A chill track with a touch of melodic dubstep in the 2nd drop üíï.

seeker.title: Seeker
seeker.description: Thank you so much for the 2k followers on soundcloud <3.

the-dream.title: The Dream
the-dream.description: Let me know what you think! hope you like it <3.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: Chill vibes for you ‚ù§. Deep chill track by Dimatis.

vicious-mind-instrumental.title: Vicious Mind (Instrumental)
vicious-mind-instrumental.description: Some people asked me for the instrumental of this song, so here it is! and I couldn't upload the original to spotify because of Alan Watts vocals. Hope you like it ‚ù§

among-us.title: Among Us
among-us.description: End the 2017 and start the 2018 with a pure melodic dubstep track, hope you like it ‚ù§

breathe.title: Breathe
breathe.description: I made this track for the Panama eSports community.

fanciful.title: Fanciful
fanciful.description: One of my favorite triplet melody that I ever made.

white-dwarf.title: White Dwarf
white-dwarf.description: Many times I inspire my music for that feeling that transmits me to think about the universe, this is one of them and I hope you like it.

magical-forest.title: Magical Forest
magical-forest.description: Magical Forest was one of my first songs that I really liked.
